Class Garden

java.lang.Object
Garden
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Garden
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
This class is used for garden ratings and using this in the view to draw out the garden
Author:
Tara Fishman
